page.title: 15Hatfield Broad Oak Clubs: 2
page.content: { }In addition to the various clubs already listed an important role in local life and leisure is played by the school, both by virtue of various after-school activities run by staff and parents and by its flourishing Parent Teacher Association. The out-of-school activities currently include netball or rounders (depending on the season), needlework, gardening, computer club and Saturday morning swimming. The PTA organises educational meetings, social functions and fund- raising events. As well as paying the running costs of the swimming pool, the financial support of the PTA makes possible regular educational visits for the children, provides books and equipment and meets numerous minor school expenses throughout the year.
